title: 73: OBITCH life's short get a truck!
description:
Ring ring….hello Geoffs! This week’s episode is….explosive! That’s right, Spencer is coming to the table with some stories of exploding caskets. Afterwards Madison is taking us through some incredible stories of people who posthumously rose to fame….and we pronounce posthumously wrong the entire time! We’ve got an obituary for a scandalous lady, one that’s sweet, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalllllls!!! 



New episodes come out every Thursday for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.


Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram @obitchuarypodcast on TikTok


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:

https://historyplex.com/people-who-became-famous-posthumously#:~:text=Description%3A%20Anne%20Frank%20not%20only%20became%20famous%20after,believe%20that%20people%20are%20really%20good%20at%20heart

https://www.scoopwhoop.com/trivia/people-who-became-famous-after-death/

https://www.grunge.com/231670/the-tragic-real-life-story-of-vincent-van-gogh/

https://www.vangoghmuseum.nl/en/stories/the-woman-who-made-vincent-famous?_ga=2.252094474.264833946.1666132314-901080201.1666132314&_ga=2.252094474.264833946.1666132314-901080201.1666132314#9

https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart-news/fifty-years-after-sylvia-plaths-death-critics-are-just-starting-to-understand-her-life-15403012/

https://www.thevintagenews.com/2016/12/15/sylvia-plath-was-the-first-person-who-won-a-posthumous-pulitzer-prize/?safari=1

https://www.scoopwhoop.com/entertainment/bill-finger-creator-of-batman-/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Finger

https://www.cbr.com/bill-fingers-most-important-batman-contributions/

https://www.huffpost.com/entry/ioh-my-godi-god-is-the-pr_b_362417

http://edwood.org

https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/dallasmorningnews/name/edward-merritt-obituary?id=25054172

https://obits.gazette.com/us/obituaries/gazette/name/ida-mahone-obituary?id=7336553

https://www.syracuse.com/news/2022/10/man-hit-by-train-has-no-obituary-but-at-syracuse-burger-king-they-saved-him-a-seat.html 

-https://www.cbsnews.com/news/megan-barnes-driving-while-shaving-fla-woman-arrested-after-crash-grooming-bikini-area-say-cops/

https://nypost.com/2022/10/14/edward-scissorhands-mystery-man-cuts-neighbors-trees-overnight/

https://www.newspapers.com/image/382648327/?terms=%22coffin%20explosion%22&match=1

https://www.newspapers.com/image/698438322/?terms=%22funeral%20explosion%22&match=1

https://www.washingtonpost.com/posteverything/wp/2014/08/11/what-you-should-know-about-exploding-caskets/


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
